title: NUST observes Independence Day with patriotic zeal
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 14 (APP):National University of Sciences and Technology (NUST) observed Pakistan’s Independence Day with patriotic zeal and enthusiasm.
In a celebratory event held at the university’s main campus, the chief guest Maj Gen Dr. Saeed ur Rehman Sarwar HI (M), DG Projects NUST, hoisted the green and white flag in the presence of an overwhelming number of NUST students, and families of faculty and staff.
Children from the NUST community, with their captivating speeches and rendition of national songs, paid glowing tribute to the forefathers for their immeasurable sacrifices to make Pakistan a reality.
The chief guest, in his insightful speech, encouraged every member of the society to contribute to nation building in their respective roles.
The foreign representatives of Mozambique, Nepal, Sri Lanka, South Africa, Morocco, Kenya, China, Jordan, Azerbaijan, Turkey and Egypt were also present at the ceremony.
